infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: My Compass uses the camera for event check-in and travel claim receipt scanning.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: My Compass may save images to your photo library and allows you to attach receipt photos to travel claims.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: My Compass uses your location to find nearby commands and events.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: My Compass syncs leave requests to your calendar.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: My Compass creates reminders for important career milestones.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: My Compass uses Face ID to secure your sensitive personnel data.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: My Compass accesses contacts to help you connect with sailors.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: My Compass uses the camera for event check-in and travel claim receipt scanning.

plugins.photosPermission: My Compass allows you to attach receipt photos to travel claims.
plugins.cameraPermission: My Compass uses the camera to capture receipt photos for travel claims.
